description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.3M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with 10647802 Canada. The average
  contract duration was 1.08 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $672.0K. The longest
  contract was 3.84 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $9.3M.
lookup_name: '10647802 CANADA'

s431_number_of_contracts: '20'

s422_max_contract_value: '9.3M'
